text: Dughiar kabanang Iesusɨn suren gumazamizibar dɨbobonim bar ghuavanadi. Ezɨ suren gumazir maba Grighɨn akam a mɨgei, ezɨ marazi Aramɨn akam mɨgei. Ezɨ Grighba me ghaze, “Dughiar avɨriba ia zurara gumazamizir dagheba puvatɨzibar akurvasi, egha ia en amuir odiaribar akurvazir puvatɨ.” Bizir kam bagha me atari.(6:1) Aramɨn akam, a Judia ko Galilin Distrighɨn gumazibar akam. A Hibrun akamɨn mɨn ghu.
